EmailTemplate.description: EGPWS Service Agreement to be sent after customer confirms the quote
EmailTemplate.name: AT - 2nd Step - EGPWS Service Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: EGPWS Service Agreement {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for your reply.
Enclosed, you will find the EGPWS Service Agreement. Please sign it and return it to us. We will then update your account and make the database available to you.
If you require any additional assistance feel free to reply to this email or contact us at the phone number below.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
602-436-6739
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
